title: Node.js With SQL Server on Docker
description: This lab walks through the evolution of a simple Node.js bulletin board application, running on Docker. You'll start with a simple app that uses hard-coded data, then add SQL Server for persistent storage, and a proxy to improve web performance.

meta.title: Node.js With SQL Server on Docker
meta.description: Learn how to build a Node.js bulletin board app with SQL Server and Docker, including packaging, running, and monitoring your application.
meta.keywords: linux lab, linux practice exercises, online kali linux terminal, practice linux commands online, linux practice online, docker command line, docker playground, web application, linux labs, sql server
